actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction from gross income for donations of blood to nonprofit blood banks and other nonprofit organizations.

summary.text: Allows a deduction from gross income in an amount of $25 per pint for donations of blood to nonprofit blood banks and other nonprofit organizations under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a deduction from gross income for donations of blood to nonprofit blood banks and other nonprofit organizations.
